events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail on the highway during heavy rain conditions.
Claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the keywords and initial report details provided by the claimant.
Agent John Smith was assigned to handle the claim and promptly contacted the claimant to arrange next steps.
The insurance claim has been officially acknowledged and the claimant was informed about the upcoming investigation process.
Request was sent to the claimant to provide the police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and a detailed repair quote from a certified mechanic.
Investigation team initiated assessment and contacted the repair shop to verify estimated damages for the vehicle.
Investigation concluded with validation of submitted documents and confirmation of damages aligning with the reported accident circumstances.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the vehicle repair costs as per the evaluation, including partial coverage for rental car expenses.
The claimant responded positively to the settlement proposal, appreciating the promptness and fairness of the offer.
The claim has been officially approved pending payment disbursement as per agreed settlement terms.
The reimbursement payment was issued to the claimant's bank account to cover approved repair and rental costs.
The insurance claim was closed after successful payment and confirmation from claimant that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim files and documentation have been archived securely for future reference and compliance with regulatory retention policies.
